CreateApp.description: Grants permission to create an app

CreateCampaign.description: Grants permission to create a campaign for an app

CreateEmailTemplate.description: Grants permission to create an email template

CreateExportJob.description: Grants permission to create an export job that exports endpoint definitions to Amazon S3

CreateImportJob.description: Grants permission to import endpoint definitions from to create a segment

CreateInAppTemplate.description: Grants permission to create an in-app message template

CreateJourney.description: Grants permission to create a Journey for an app

CreatePushTemplate.description: Grants permission to create a push notification template

CreateRecommenderConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Pinpoint configuration for a recommender model

CreateSegment.description: Grants permission to create a segment that is based on endpoint data reported to Pinpoint by your app. To allow a user to create a segment by importing endpoint data from outside of Pinpoint, allow the mobiletargeting:CreateImportJob action

CreateSmsTemplate.description: Grants permission to create an sms message template

CreateVoiceTemplate.description: Grants permission to create a voice message template

DeleteAdmChannel.description: Grants permission to delete the ADM channel for an app

DeleteApnsChannel.description: Grants permission to delete the APNs channel for an app

DeleteApnsSandboxChannel.description: Grants permission to delete the APNs sandbox channel for an app

DeleteApnsVoipChannel.description: Grants permission to delete the APNs VoIP channel for an app

DeleteApnsVoipSandboxChannel.description: Grants permission to delete the APNs VoIP sandbox channel for an app

DeleteApp.description: Grants permission to delete a specific campaign

DeleteBaiduChannel.description: Grants permission to delete the Baidu channel for an app

DeleteCampaign.description: Grants permission to delete a specific campaign

DeleteEmailChannel.description: Grants permission to delete the email channel for an app

DeleteEmailTemplate.description: Grants permission to delete an email template or an email template version

DeleteEndpoint.description: Grants permission to delete an endpoint

DeleteEventStream.description: Grants permission to delete the event stream for an app

DeleteGcmChannel.description: Grants permission to delete the GCM channel for an app

DeleteInAppTemplate.description: Grants permission to delete an in-app message template or an in-app message template version

DeleteJourney.description: Grants permission to delete a specific journey

DeletePushTemplate.description: Grants permission to delete a push notification template or a push notification template version

DeleteRecommenderConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Pinpoint configuration for a recommender model

DeleteSegment.description: Grants permission to delete a specific segment

DeleteSmsChannel.description: Grants permission to delete the SMS channel for an app

DeleteSmsTemplate.description: Grants permission to delete an sms message template or an sms message template version

DeleteUserEndpoints.description: Grants permission to delete all of the endpoints that are associated with a user ID

DeleteVoiceChannel.description: Grants permission to delete the Voice channel for an app

DeleteVoiceTemplate.description: Grants permission to delete a voice message template or a voice message template version

GetAdmChannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Device Messaging (ADM) channel for an app

GetApnsChannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the APNs channel for an app

GetApnsSandboxChannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the APNs sandbox channel for an app

GetApnsVoipChannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the APNs VoIP channel for an app

GetApnsVoipSandboxChannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the APNs VoIP sandbox channel for an app

GetApp.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific app in your Amazon Pinpoint account

GetApplicationDateRangeKpi.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard metric that applies to an application

GetApplicationSettings.description: Grants permission to retrieve the default settings for an app

GetApps.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of apps in your Amazon Pinpoint account

GetBaiduChannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Baidu channel for an app

GetCampaign.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific campaign

GetCampaignActivities.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the activities performed by a campaign

GetCampaignDateRangeKpi.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard metric that applies to a campaign

GetCampaignVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific campaign version

GetCampaignVersions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the current and prior versions of a campaign

GetCampaigns.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all campaigns for an app

GetChannels.description: Grants permission to get all channels information for your app

GetEmailChannel.description: Grants permission to obtain information about the email channel in an app

GetEmailTemplate.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific or the active version of an email template

GetEndpoint.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific endpoint

GetEventStream.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the event stream for an app

GetExportJob.description: Grants permission to obtain information about a specific export job

GetExportJobs.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all of the export jobs for an app

GetGcmChannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the GCM channel for an app

GetImportJob.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific import job

GetImportJobs.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all import jobs for an app

GetInAppMessages.description: Grants permission to retrive in-app messages for the given endpoint id

GetInAppTemplate.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific or the active version of an in-app message template

GetJourney.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific journey

GetJourneyDateRangeKpi.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard engagement metric that applies to a journey

GetJourneyExecutionActivityMetrics.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard execution metric that applies to a journey activity

GetJourneyExecutionMetrics.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard execution metric that applies to a journey

GetPushTemplate.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific or the active version of an push notification template

GetRecommenderConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an Amazon Pinpoint configuration for a recommender model

GetRecommenderConfigurations.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all the recommender model configurations that are associated with an Amazon Pinpoint account

GetSegment.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific segment

GetSegmentExportJobs.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about jobs that export endpoint definitions from segments to Amazon S3

GetSegmentImportJobs.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about jobs that create segments by importing endpoint definitions from

GetSegmentVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific segment version

GetSegmentVersions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the current and prior versions of a segment

GetSegments.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the segments for an app

GetSmsChannel.description: Grants permission to obtain information about the SMS channel in an app

GetSmsTemplate.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific or the active version of an sms message template

GetUserEndpoints.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the endpoints that are associated with a user ID

GetVoiceChannel.description: Grants permission to obtain information about the Voice channel in an app

GetVoiceTemplate.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific or the active version of a voice message template

ListJourneys.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all journeys for an app

ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

ListTemplateVersions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all versions about a specific template

ListTemplates.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata about the queried templates

PhoneNumberValidate.description: Grants permission to obtain metadata for a phone number, such as the number type (mobile, landline, or VoIP), location, and provider

PutEventStream.description: Grants permission to create or update an event stream for an app

PutEvents.description: Grants permission to create or update events for an app

RemoveAttributes.description: Grants permission to remove the attributes for an app

SendMessages.description: Grants permission to send an SMS message or push notification to specific endpoints

SendOTPMessage.description: Grants permission to send an OTP code to a user of your application

SendUsersMessages.description: Grants permission to send an SMS message or push notification to all endpoints that are associated with a specific user ID

TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

UpdateAdmChannel.description: Grants permission to update the Amazon Device Messaging (ADM) channel for an app

UpdateApnsChannel.description: Grants permission to update the Apple Push Notification service (APNs) channel for an app

UpdateApnsSandboxChannel.description: Grants permission to update the Apple Push Notification service (APNs) sandbox channel for an app

UpdateApnsVoipChannel.description: Grants permission to update the Apple Push Notification service (APNs) VoIP channel for an app

UpdateApnsVoipSandboxChannel.description: Grants permission to update the Apple Push Notification service (APNs) VoIP sandbox channel for an app

UpdateApplicationSettings.description: Grants permission to update the default settings for an app

UpdateBaiduChannel.description: Grants permission to update the Baidu channel for an app

UpdateCampaign.description: Grants permission to update a specific campaign

UpdateEmailChannel.description: Grants permission to update the email channel for an app

UpdateEmailTemplate.description: Grants permission to update a specific email template under the same version or generate a new version

UpdateEndpoint.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint or update the information for an endpoint

UpdateEndpointsBatch.description: Grants permission to create or update endpoints as a batch operation

UpdateGcmChannel.description: Grants permission to update the Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) or Google Cloud Messaging (GCM) API key that allows to send push notifications to your Android app

UpdateInAppTemplate.description: Grants permission to update a specific in-app message template under the same version or generate a new version

UpdateJourney.description: Grants permission to update a specific journey

UpdateJourneyState.description: Grants permission to update a specific journey state

UpdatePushTemplate.description: Grants permission to update a specific push notification template under the same version or generate a new version

UpdateRecommenderConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update an Amazon Pinpoint configuration for a recommender model

UpdateSegment.description: Grants permission to update a specific segment

UpdateSmsChannel.description: Grants permission to update the SMS channel for an app

UpdateSmsTemplate.description: Grants permission to update a specific sms message template under the same version or generate a new version

UpdateTemplateActiveVersion.description: Grants permission to update the active version parameter of a specific template

UpdateVoiceChannel.description: Grants permission to update the Voice channel for an app

UpdateVoiceTemplate.description: Grants permission to update a specific voice message template under the same version or generate a new version

VerifyOTPMessage.description: Grants permission to check the validity of One-Time Passwords (OTPs)

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a key that is present in the request the user makes to the pinpoint service

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag key and value pair

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the list of all the tag key names present in the request the user makes to the pinpoint service
